subject: Steroids
lead_paragraph: Barry Bonds went back and forth Friday night after he moved to one home run behind Hank Aaron, swaying from edgy to indifferent, from introspective to terse, from clarity to confusion.
snippet: Barry Bonds went back and forth Friday night after he moved to one home run behind Hank Aaron, swaying from edgy to indifferent, from introspective to terse, from clarity to confusion.
